physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Examination demonstrated generalized shiny, flat-topped, 1 to 2-mm papules arranged in a rippled pattern over his trunk, arms, and legs. The anterior shins showed several hyperkeratotic, violaceous, 2 to 5 cm plaques and nodules, bilaterally.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pruritus improved significantly within 2 weeks, and the hypertrophic lichen planus flattened. However, the tiny papules of lichen amyloidosis remained unaffected at the 6-week follow-up. At the last follow-up, no change was observed in the lesions of lichen amyloidosis, whereas the lesions of hypertrophic lichen planus flattened to the level of normal skin.
